lead_paragraph: Facing skepticism in the courts, the commission has opted for detailed rationales for its rules, even if it can’t put solid numbers into the cost-benefit equation.

headline.main: The State of Cost-Benefit Analysis at the S.E.C.

snippet: Facing skepticism in the courts, the commission has opted for detailed rationales for its rules, even if it can’t put solid numbers into the cost-benefit equation.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
